divs: Sighting Detailsthere has been object observed first from my front door, approx 3weeks ago, andi took still 35mm pictures, in fact,the roll is still in my camera, i dont knowif they will turn out or not,i took maybe 5.this object is like an arrow but thehorizontal line is only as long as the slanted lines, and looking at it withbinoculars i can see red ,bluishviolet lights as if these lights were some sortof exhaust.and this thing moves a lot,james thinks it maybe a satellite, but iam not convinced.tonight i saw this object about 6 or 7 inches below the end ofthe small dipper and maybe 5 inches to the left.i am sorry i do not knowlongitude or latitude, butiknow if you came out to see it,you will.i appreciateyour time and hope to speak to someone from your organization.also what do youthink of implantsi have whatappears to be a metal but flexible fragmentin myinner arm thathas been there for 10 year sor more,i have tried to pick itout,butam unable to get to it.and i have had no injury ever to that site.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Crestline
There were no other sightings in Crestline on or around October 7th 2003
